entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: E 27 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
